data.title: Bonäs bygdegård in Mora
data.meta_description: Find all information about Bonäs bygdegård here and book easily at no extra costs.
data.text:
Located in Mora, 46 km from Dalhalla Amphitheatre, Bonäs bygdegård provides accommodation with a private beach area, free private parking, an open-air bath and a garden. The property features lake and inner courtyard views, and is 7.4 km from Vasaloppet Museum. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. All units comprise a seating area, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a microwave, a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. The holiday home offers certain units that include garden views, and every unit has a private bathroom and a dressing room. The units feature bed linen. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mora, like hiking. Tomteland is 25 km from Bonäs bygdegård, while Zorn Museum is 7.5 km away. The nearest airport is Mora Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties. Please inform Bonäs bygdegård in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
